attributes.action: “Publish NOW and be damned”  the report from the Chilcot Inquiry into the Gulf War.
attributes.additional_details:
The report from the Chilcot Inquiry into the Gulf War(s) is ready to be published.

The report identifies those responsible for misdemeanours in instigating, starting and conducting the Gulf War(s).

That the present administration in Whitehall is deliberately delaying the publication of the report from the Chilcot Inquiry, is a cause of concern and leads to an unnecessary suspicion and resentment in the minds of those interested in reading the report from the Chilcot Inquiry.

It is demanded that the report from the Chilcot Inquiry be published NOW, without further delay.
